articles.title: Mysterious 'golden orb' found at the bottom of ocean baffles scientists - GOOD
articles.description: The researchers wondered whether the golden object was a 'dead sponge attachment,' 'a coral,' or 'an egg laid by a mysterious creature.'
articles.content: Despite their great significance, ninety-five percent of oceans on Earth remain unexplored. Scientists have always been curious to know about the mysteries that lurk and the creatures who live there,… [+3651 chars]
